archimate:Requirement.name: Store content on the system to prevent external change
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Addresses compliance by avoiding outdated/accidentally modified non-compliant answers.
From the meeting Q&A Repository: A quick review, chaired by Mattias Dahlberg 2023-04-13, with the attendance of Susanne Lindström, Hemant Chawan and Jaroslav Jurka
○ Sussie and Hemant agreed that the requirement "Store content on the system to prevent external change" is deprecated § Hemant's solution for the risk of inaccurate content, is to assign someone to review external content annually. (Roles and Responsibilities to be defined) § This does not mean that text or attached files will not be stored in the system, but that a decision where to store the content will be done based on the need.
